QuestData.Title: Without a Captain or Crew
QuestData.Description: Not sure who you're with, but you don't look like one of... them.$B$BI'm not sure what happened. I slept through supper and woke up to a ship full of dead people and murderers.$B$BNot sure if you want to kill me or not, but I'll spare you the trouble.$B$B<Moody points to a wound in his stomach. His insides are not where they should be.>$B$BI can keep steering the ship for a while longer. You don't die from a gut wound immediately. Just bring me some rope and some rum... no, whiskey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring First Mate Moody a Bottle of Whiskey and a Spool of Rope.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have what I asked for?
QuestData.RewardText: All right, help me get tied to the wheel.$B$B<Moody sips from the bottle.>
